name: Flappy Hot Dog
description:
Guide your Flappy Hot Dog through the trials ahead to great victory. Mind the bundles of spaghetti or you'll be cooked!  

Features:
• Hot Dogs
• Spaghetti
• Picnic Blanket
• Game Center Support with LeaderBoard 
• Post to Twitter within App
• Post to Facebook within App & All Social Media sites
• Email within App
• Apple iMessage within App
